text:
Explorer.ai | Software Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | Onsite

Explorer.ai is a platform to build, update and serve maps for self-driving cars.

We are looking for an engineer who want to enable the future of autonomous vehicles across the world. You must have experience in building large scale systems that are reliable and maintainable. This would be an opportunity to be a part of the core team.

If you think you have crazy software engineering chops to solve really hard problems involving robotics, machine learning and distributed systems write to us at : ag [at] explorer.ai
